channel.title: Arts on Megan Reddy
channel.description: Recent content in Arts on Megan Reddy

item.title: 3D Modeling
item.description: 3D Modeling 1. Violin October 2021 Tools: Maya and Arnold 2. Ice Cream Pop Art October 2021 Tools: Maya and Arnold Toon Shader 3. Object Study October 2021 Tools: Maya and Arnold

item.title: Animation
item.description: Animation 1. Animated Short Film: “Monsoon” December 2019 VIEW PROJECT VIDEO HIGHLIGHTS University of Virginia ARCH 5420 Final Project Description: I created a 1-3 minute animation incorporating themes from the entire semester (time, light, etc.). Features and Responsibilities: Modeled, shaded, rigged, and animated all characters and settings (with the exception of the gate and power line - courtesy of TurboSquid) MEL scripting to manipulate the rain, wind, and light intensity Rendered over 3,500 frames in V-Ray using multiple computers Features V-Ray Mesh Lighting and Environmental Fog Improvements:

item.title: Digital Art
item.description: Digital Art 1. Labrador Retriever August 2019 Program: Procreate Description: This drawing was inspired by my 13-year-old chocolate Labrador Retriever who always has a goofy smile on her face. 2. Hot Chocolate September 2019 Program: Procreate Description: I drew this from a photo I took at our local coffee shop.
